text: Lorenzo Soria (27 November 1951 â€“ 7 August 2020) was an Argentine-born Italian journalist and executive. He was President of the Hollywood Foreign Press Association for three terms between 2003 to 2005, 2015 to 2017 and again from 2019 until his death. He worked as a journalist for La Stampa and L'espresso. Soria was born in Buenos Aires. Soria died on 7 August 2020 in Los Angeles from lung cancer, aged 68.Lorenzo Soria Dies: Hollywood Foreign Press Association President Was 68 ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Buenos Aires Category:Italian journalists Category:Italian businesspeople Category:Writers from Buenos Aires Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles
title: Lorenzo Soria
